import React from 'react' import '../resources/css/Card.css' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addItem } from '../store/Product' import { useState } from 'react' function ItemComponent({props}) { const [amount, setAmount] = useState(1) const [totalAmount, setTotalAmount] = useState() const dispatch=useDispatch() return (

{props.name}

Price: {props.price}$

In store: {props.avalible}

About:

{props.characteristics}

Amount:

{setAmount(e.target.value)}} />
) } export default ItemComponent
